website_summaries.verdict: The Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch (Retina Display) is the best way to carry the pixels of a large-screen monitor with you on the road. It's ideal for people who make their living with visuals.
cons: Requires Retina-optimized apps for best user experience

customer_reviews.title: Move from PC to MacBook the best choice I made in years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used to replace my 2 year old Acer laptop. I could not be happier with the one desire for a larger hard drive. The flash is incredibly fast. For that matter everything on this MacBook is supper fast. I was one of those long time PC owners that finally gave up because a quality PC laptop is now more than my MacBook Pro Retina. The Retina display is very impressive. I was most surprisee by web pages. They are so much better than clearer than on my 14" Acer. If you are on the fence between moving away from PCs to Macs I can say come on in the water is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Goodby Windows!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first Apple computer, even though I've had Nanos, iPods and iPads since they've been out. Quite a few actually since I buy them for the whole family, and usually upgrade to new ones and ebay last years models. It is way faster than my Dell laptop, mainly when starting up, or waking up. Same with updating software including the OS. I'm done with Microsoft - only reason I waited so long is this computer is EXPENSIVE. Oh, the latest OS upgrade is FREE from Apple, as opposed to the usual $120 or more for Windows upgrades that are usually buggy for quite a while
customer_reviews.author: SilverGhost

customer_reviews.title: Macbook pro retina 13 inch display
customer_reviews.text: Nice upgrade from my 5 year old black macbook. Much faster login and uploading than the older unit. Love the Retina display for sharper viewing of my photos. I use this laptop a lot for digital photography and like the fact that it has an SD card reader built in, also I like the backlit keyboard which I did not have before. Also like the fact that it has a solid state hard drive. Not so sure about apple ditching the CD drive but so far I haven't missed it too much. I am very happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Neanderthal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer with one little precaution
customer_reviews.text: This computer basically runs my recording studio and I definitely make it work hard. It holds up to everything I throw at it and then asks for more! It boots up amazingly fast and everything runs smoothly. As expected from Apple, right! But what I didn't expect was the touchpad to stop working. And I've looked it up. Many people with this computer have this problem. Apple should have never let this model go out with this design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Worst spend of 600 bucks ever
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a computer that I can’t even use! I’ve been on the phone with Apple all night and have to either return it or take it to an Apple store to get MAC OS installed which was supposed to already be on there! Worst spend of 600 bucks ever!
customer_reviews.author: Tinese Harris

customer_reviews.title: It's a Mac
customer_reviews.text: Well made laptop with a beautiful Retina display screen. It's lightweight, has a battery that has been lasting over six hours so far. Presumably as the battery ages, that number will continue decreasing. Comes loaded with lots of useful software, but you'll have to buy most branded programs from their makers (Microsoft, Adobe, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Edward J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: It's as good as everyone else says it is. The only thing that confused me about it was its lack of battery capacity indicator and sleeping status light. But I realized that these were unnecessary because the battery lasts a long time and it goes into a deep sleep if the battery is completely drained. As soon as you plug it in, it returns right back to where you left off.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Vance

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love this laptop! I had an old dell laptop and finally decided to upgrade and this one is great. So light weight and user friendly. Also wanted one that would to sync with my iphone and this does. When I take pictures with the iphone, they are automatically sent to my photos on my laptop. The retina display is very vivid and clear.
customer_reviews.author: calalily

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: If you are frugal about your technology then yes this probably isn't the notebook for you. If you are looking for something that looks great and works great with your Apple products buy it now. I'm in commercial IT sales and know all the competition which is exceptional. It really depends on what one is looking for in a notebook these days. Apple builds a machine that is not easily modified by the user which depending on the user can be a pro or con. Currently on the beta technology cuff probably not, machine works without user frustration, Yes.
customer_reviews.author: njh12000

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Macbook 1181A since 2009. Worked fine, still works ok but slower and I wanted something faster with a better screen resolution. This fit the bill perfectly. Love it! If you're undecided between this and the previous version without the Retina screen, I highly recommend this version. It's worth the extra few hundred bucks to me.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Love my new MacBook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I have used PCs for years and the new MacBook Pro with Retina Display is awesome. It is so easy to use and has a low learning curve. The display is amazing, clear and crisp. I used a Mac at work many years ago but this was more amazing to work with. And it works on the ICloud so I can share my photos and music on my Iphone. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great upgrade if your going from a 11 or 13 inch non retina to a retina MBP. But if your moving from a 15 inch or larger model to this your going to feel short changed on screen size even with the amazing clarity of the retina display. This is a great laptop if your highly mobile and need portability. But if your primary use environment will be around the house than you may want to spend the extra money and go for the 15 inch retina, your eyes will tank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already having major issues.. the speaker broke. ...
customer_reviews.text: Already having major issues.. the speaker broke.. the screen display is in and out about to break any day now.. but thats what i get, should have bought new
customer_reviews.author: RyanHuskyPupLover

customer_reviews.title: good laptop but bad used item
customer_reviews.text: i got used device and its headphone jack is bad. i can hardly hear from one side . so i hear only from one ear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I'm upgrading from a six year old laptop, so anything I bought would have been an upgrade, but this one is genuinely great. The solid state hard drive makes it blazing quick: It reboots in about ten seconds! I bought this laptop mainly for photo editing, and it's really fast. I purchased this laptop from Amazon Warehouse, and it turned out there was a small ding on the bottom of the laptop, which was not written in the description of the product condition. Hence only 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Best computer/laptop I have ever used. Wished I had made the move from broken Windows to Mac a long time ago. Super fast start up Very clear display Plenty of storage Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: rlsmith17

customer_reviews.title: Masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. From top to bottom is just a beauty and a beast at the same time. Beauty in its stylish modern looks, simple, it gives you the feeling is strong..not like others light weighted laptops. Beast for its performance. Fast, reliable and good battery life. I'm happy I made this purchase. It will help me a lot as a student in the years to come!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: great Mac
customer_reviews.text: this computer is fast clear and sharp i love it, pretty light too even tho its a 2012 version but who really cares macs last forever
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien  Narcisse

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Mac Book Pro great retina display Very fast speed and good sound when listening to music One of my best decisions I've made I recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: A. Decker

customer_reviews.title: Superlative performance and style
customer_reviews.text: I keep asking myself why I waited so long to make the switch to Mac. Superior in every way-performance, style, ease of use etc. Just a word of advice: when buying gear such as covers, keyboard protectors and the like, make sure the items are specifically for the model number of your machine--in my case the new Mac Book Pro with Retina Display.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K. Buck

customer_reviews.title: John F
customer_reviews.text: As a writer I was looking for a laptop that was light weight, durible, and had a processor that can handle multiple applications running at the same time. This laptop was just that. With a retnia display that makes viewing movies or pictures a most enjoyable experience. It also has a modern sleek look that draws compliments whenever I go.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: It's The Display
customer_reviews.text: The retina display is great, performance has been excellent. Long time Windows user moving over to Apple. I recommend no smaller than a 256 GB drive
customer_reviews.author: Gary Awad

customer_reviews.title: like new, only surface has a little pit
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is clean, like new, only surface has a little pit, but i am sure it does not hurt the screen. it is a pity that the laptop has no charger, so i spend $80 for a new charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I boughted a computer from this fraudster in November and ...
customer_reviews.text: I boughted a computer from this fraudster in November and it's been four months and I have to buy a new ssd bc was damage already, I will doubt about every item he has
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I have had
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th laptop and the best one ever for my use. Applications and documents open instantly due to the total flash memory. The picture is sharp and photo modifications are easy. Light weight make it easy to take most anywhere you might take a tablet and there is so many more benefits to the full computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Mac user for years and this is an outstanding MacBook. I use it for game development with Unity Pro and it's quite responsive. Light and very portable, a great middle ground between a larger MacBook and the Air. Great machine ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Vic Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: I really like my MAC. I've been a PC user for a lot of years. I'm still learning some of the differences.
customer_reviews.author: Golfman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my needs as I have bad eyesight as a student. Everything is so much clearer compared to a Macbook Air screen.
customer_reviews.author: House Chores

customer_reviews.title: Great but big...
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop wish these features came in the 13" model...
customer_reviews.author: Doubletp

customer_reviews.title: great but 128GB? really?
customer_reviews.text: -amazing laptop, only problem is who in the hell creates a computer with 128GB of storage!! I understand its a solid state but come on! -if ur planning on buying this computer because its the cheapest retina display, i suggest u buy an external hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: Ali A. Nawfal

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a year ago and so far it is wonderful! I have had no major problems with this product
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer!
customer_reviews.text: The retina display is beautiful! Definitely worth getting. The computer runes very smoothly and boot up times for applications is very fast! If your looking for a new computer I would definitely recommend this computer or if you have a little extra money get the 15 inch Macbook Pro Retina.
customer_reviews.author: Brenden

customer_reviews.title: The best computers on the market!
customer_reviews.text: The best computers on the market! This is my second MAC and I love it! The Retina display is incredible and the speed of the computer is wonderful! It is pricey, but it is worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Borders

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop out there
customer_reviews.text: Very fast, reliable, good looking. The retina display is amazing, very gentle to my eyes. I wish there were bigger retinas... This Mac is just what I need & it was definitely worth extra $$$ for the display.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new laptop! It's really works well and makes my eyes very comfortable with the Retina Display, even though I continue working 6 hours ! It is really worth the price and I'd like to recommend it to my friends. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Screen is a little small for multiple windows, but is crystal clear. Lighted keyboard is awesome. Very fast with all processes. moving from PC to MAC presents it's own issues -- just a longer learning curve! Easily portable, thin and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a "like-new" MacBook Pro Retina from Amazon Warehouse and it turned out to be a lemon. It would not turn on regardless of whether I connected the power supply or whether it was running on battery. What a hassle! When I contacted Amazon, they told me that I would have to pay for the return shipping out of my pocket. Unbelievable! I have to pay to ship back a defective item?! For shame! Amazon Warehouse should check the merchandise (e.g. TRY TURNING IT ON!) before selling them as "like-new" when it is actually "like-defective."
customer_reviews.author: Matt's Dad

customer_reviews.title: My First MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about it. Battery life is fantastic, it's easy to use and the display is excellent. Haven't found a single problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: alewis41

customer_reviews.title: All Problems!
customer_reviews.text: The first 3 days were great i loved the screen and everything. Then , the first time i tried to connect a usb pen drive I realize the one in the left is dead! A week after , the screen has a red vertical line of stuck pixels. Big Disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Damián Dagnino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Description was 100% accurate. Completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Byron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing machine, fast, slim, silent and beautiful!!! Apple did again with honor this fancy laptop. I certain recommend everybody to buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jonatas

customer_reviews.title: Everything as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on schedule. Well kept and in good condition. Had all assessories including book. Thankyou for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Pro 13 inch with retina display
customer_reviews.text: Having had numerous PCs which worked great when I first used them and then started having numerous errors after about a year, I decided to try the Mac. Although there is a learning curve switching to the new operating system, I have to say that the Mac is super intuitive, very fast and a real pleasure to work with. Although the retina display wasn't absolutely necessary for what I do, it makes pictures look gorgeous. This was an expensive investment, but so far I feel it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Russin

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Fast with Retina display.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, as advertised. works great, haven't run into any issues so far. Didn't felt any slower than the current generation.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: The best  laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Finger drives almost touch screen. Fast and beautiful striking retina display. I recommend this product to all my friends and colleagues.
customer_reviews.author: Maximo H Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. it is super fast and is perfect for travel. The screen is amazing and easy to look at for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but expensive
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of in-depth reviews out there, so I'll keep this brief. This is a fantastic piece of hardware, but it is expensive and there are probably more cost-effective options for most people. I'm a photography hobbyist, and a sucker for high-detail, crisp images; after seeing my photos on the Retina, it really does make everything else (even 1080 HD) look like pixilated rubbish. Also, this is the first Apple computer I've owned, and I have to say I really like Mountain Lion. So, as with most Apple products, if you can stomach the cost then you'll get a beautifully designed, high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly surprised by the lack of CD drive but that's my own fault. The screen is amazing for looking at photos taken with a high resolution camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peykar

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, but pixel errors after a while.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to say about apple, they are super. the only negative: after about a year or so, first pixel errors appeared on screen (pixel always white, so on a dark screen you se that tiny spot). Meanwhile a few more. Quite surprised to see this. Also, after about 3 years, the battery definitely loses strength and is empty faster
customer_reviews.author: Jan G

customer_reviews.title: Best computer I've owned....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way.... Well worth every cent. Integrates well with all Apple devices. I'm an Apple customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Mark1234

customer_reviews.title: Great work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Macbook Pro. Great screen. You will love it! It even works with my Android Tablet Idolian STUDIO that I recently bought. I love my macbook and STUDIO tablet together! I thought only IPad will sync with my android tablet but I was wrong! I'm learning a lot of things to use Apple computer now. It's awesome! love I switched over from Windows!
customer_reviews.author: Hard Metal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful computer
customer_reviews.text: Nice product from Apple I like it It is wonderful computer with Retina display that is amazing Also , I like the Mac os
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: I had some trouble with ordering the right size
customer_reviews.text: I had some trouble with the size I had to re-order a few times but now I finally got the right one and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cartaya

customer_reviews.title: Best MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: HD SSD is very fast, retina display is amazing and the HDMI port is the must! If you thinking buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Bucci

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is great, works for everything that stands for. I recommend anyone to buy it. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ALLAN R. OLIVEIRA

customer_reviews.title: It's more expensive, but it's worth every $$
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Mac person since Steve Jobs introduced the Mac Plus in 1984. It's more expensive, but it's worth every $$
customer_reviews.author: Bob Truelove

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Great works awesome and is in excellent condition! Vendor is really nice and very helpful! Definitely a 5 star review!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: User Experience is excellent, unified and seamless across devices. It's so thin and light! The Retina display is very crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Brommhochari

customer_reviews.title: An elegant machine
customer_reviews.text: An elegant machine. Intuitive, powerful, and beautiful. I was surprised that it reads from my PC portable hard drives. Very light and very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Howard

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Fast. Reliable and stylish. Think about additional HDD storage which you'll use for the Time Machiine and extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Grayvoronskiy

customer_reviews.title: logic board overheats after only 2.5 years
customer_reviews.text: after 2.5 years the logic board has issues and now need to spend a lot of money to fix it. Do not buy macbook because it only lasts 2-3 years and not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ali Hemmati

customer_reviews.title: pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: overall the mac is pretty fast, can run a lot of applications parallel and still has excellent reaction. Love it
customer_reviews.author: ShaoC

customer_reviews.title: What a great computer.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mac. I suppose the only negative is that it doesn't come with a disk drive, but I already had one since I formally owned a macbook pro. Apple is no longer putting disk drives into their devices, because that's not the future. I can have dozens of applications and windows open at once, and it hardly slows down. This is something I wouldn't dare do with my old macbook air. This is the best computer I've ever operated by far. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: istall91

customer_reviews.title: Finally on friendly terms with my eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a treat to myself ,and couldn't have been more happy with the purchase. macbook pro handles windows (through parallels), osx, and many more open programs without an excessive fan noise, heat , or delay. Access to mac app store and the new launchpad are a welcome addition. Frequently find myself shopping for mac "apps" that out rank the large software firms, at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week now, outstanding fit and finish, super fast, so far I can't fault it. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I am a Mac convert
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this laptop - glad i got it and I got a discount during the Amazon Thanksgiving sale. The only thng is some programs aren't compatible with Mac versus Windows.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Really Good
customer_reviews.text: Good state and fully functional, I really recommend it even though it would be better if it had more storage.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Souza

customer_reviews.title: It's an Apple...  what's there more to say?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my husband... his christmas gift. He loves it!! Especially the Retina Display. Now all he has to do is learn how to use his applications and then he'll be an expert.
customer_reviews.author: Cockers in Larsworld

customer_reviews.title: Awesome notebook!
customer_reviews.text: The MacBook Pro w/ Retina Display is simply a great laptop! No freezing, no crashing, and certainly MUCH better than Windows! A great investment for anyone who is looking to upgrade their computer experience!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: I definitely loved it. The display is just what I wanted and better than I expected it to be, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Betanco

customer_reviews.title: Lucky got it .
customer_reviews.text: I thought I lucky when purchage this one .No doub when using apple ,the thing make me feel bad is they always have a column on the left screen ,make it smaller .Hic .
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Le

customer_reviews.title: Great light MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a diff casing but fast light machine with great features. Nice intuitive user ease .. Perfect syncing with iPod iPad and iPhone .
customer_reviews.author: kourhina ko

customer_reviews.title: it's a quite nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: it's a nice laptop and i love it. however, it has scratches on the bottom and a dent on the top corner but its function works really well. thus, the shipping was really fast, i ordered on Saturday and received it on Wednesday. That's all i got so far and there's one point that i don't like about this laptop is the screen when i close it, it's has a little space between it. So far, i like it really much however i crashed when i used it for the next couple hours
customer_reviews.author: Linh v.

customer_reviews.title: have a burn in effect
customer_reviews.text: what a shame. have a burn in effect, like the plasma TV. the effect is not permanent, but happen every time even with a few minutes working
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Reis Cavallini

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought an Apple years ago!!! So easy to use with friendly support team to answer all questions. This system is very responsive!!!! Very light to carry. Actually, I love everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: great computer for the long haul!
customer_reviews.text: this laptop is great for many reason: -lightweight(in actual weight) -powerful (I can run multiple virtual machines, watch netflix, run office suite, and also have an IDE open for when I am programming) -very quiet even when the fans are screaming -sturdy(I can't tell you how many times I bumped into a wall or elevator with this in my backpack/satchel only to see nothing happened to it! I go through computers fairly quickly(well...windows computers), and can appreciate the craftsmanship in this machine. This computer still performs like the first day I got it!
customer_reviews.author: jmerook

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Pro w/Retina Display
customer_reviews.text: Luv, Luv, Luv my Apple Macbook Pro!!! Switched from Microsoft to Apple as I am an iPhone user!! Excellent Service thru Apple with any questions and automatically interacts with my Apple Phone!! So Convenient!! No more plugging in Phone to Desktop!! Luv Apple!!
customer_reviews.author: Carin Haeger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display
customer_reviews.text: If you're thinking of the macbook air, or thinking of the 15", this is the best middle ground. Enough power to get anything and everything done... But has the BEAUTIFUL retina display that once you see, you have to get... Computers now are like buying a new tv, would you buy one thats not HD? Then why consider one that isnt a retina? Think about it... and then shovel out the extra cash. You wont regret it. Ps- no DVD drive?? who would buy an air!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good prize
customer_reviews.text: As always this Apple MacBook too is a great product As Always, Amazon never fails me. It's my favority place to shop.
customer_reviews.author: shanta loungani

customer_reviews.title: Best choice ever
customer_reviews.text: The MacBook is fantastic I haven't try it yet my friend will give it to me in 4 days , she told me it arrived on time and before then we expected thanks data vision and amazon we will be in contact Alexander baillie
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: product design and operation is great
customer_reviews.text: what else could be said that has not already been said? I do wish it had an Ethernet port on the computer
customer_reviews.author: Michael Serleth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: it runs perfect, smooth never crash, run fast is perfect, I use this for development and this fullfil all my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Robledo

customer_reviews.title: Don't be hater
customer_reviews.text: Computer perfection..... worth every penny and more. There really is nothing like a Mac. Sure, there are cheaper laptops but what you get is a cheap laptop.
customer_reviews.author: DGT

customer_reviews.title: I love it...
customer_reviews.text: I love the computer i couldn't asked for a better computer. Anybody looking to get a computer should look to get a Macbook Pro with Retina Display..
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pastaurin

customer_reviews.title: gotta love macs
customer_reviews.text: It's probably more than I need, and I'm still learning all the great stuff I can do with it...but so far this computer is GREAT!! It is SO fast and light and beautiful. But I am an Apple devotee, so I'm biased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bachula

customer_reviews.title: Apple Rocks
customer_reviews.text: apple is just the best company around now-a-days. They are really up to the standards of everyones expectations. Best computer in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas Ponce

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I bought it....I just love it....it came on right on time for my summer classes...
customer_reviews.author: Maud

customer_reviews.title: apple forever and ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this laptop....apple make things really incredible..it is an excellent factory...my mac is esplendit...for its design...I try to compare with others laptops but definite I can't compare....cuz apple is other technology....
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This macbook fits all my needs. Its not heavy and its super fast. Also the SSD makes it a better computer.
customer_reviews.author: Andres van der Horst

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: its perfect. Just what i wanted it to be. loving my experience and is my first apple product. worth buying
customer_reviews.author: akhil meda

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I'm just now getting around to reviewing this...this was my first macbook purchase and I've converted. Best laptop I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Cindylou

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a top tier item. The one issue I keep seeing is the battery life. I have found some fixes looking through forums online but the 10 hr battery life listed on apple's website seems unattainable. I understand that the battery life depends on what you use the laptop for but it is a big drop off than what I imagined. Overall this computer is very intuitive and is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic labtop!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I strongly recommend everyone!!!! Retina is so powerful and it able to look very clear.. Plus, nice sounds
customer_reviews.author: Jinah  Nam

customer_reviews.title: but over all it is a great computer
customer_reviews.text: Battery runs out a little quick, but over all it is a great computer
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Romano

customer_reviews.title: Too hyped
customer_reviews.text: It's an Apple so I like the operating system better than PC but I expected God to show up on the screen the way they were talking about Retina display. I can't tell that much difference between it and my I Mac I bought 5 years ago. So little difference I called Apple to make sure my serial # was correct for Retina display. Total hype as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: richard r hays

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Greg did an excellent job working with me to get the geek squad protection transferred in my name. The Mac is in great condition, and performs very well
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: This is perfection personified
customer_reviews.text: Hey a great machine. What else can I say. Everything about it is smooth. The best laptop I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Lobelia

customer_reviews.title: excelent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this MacBook Pro and just let me say that I was impressed!!!! its so thin for a Pro version, doesnt heat up, and has a incredible retina display screen, everything is so bright and just awesome! very light weigh and it just has that perfect fit in your hands, must buy!
customer_reviews.author: The Cop runner

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy how fast the system boots up, had trouble updating the Operating system, the Apple store helped with no charge. Especially love weight and screen size.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Pro Retina 13" - Fantastic display
customer_reviews.text: the display and performance are just fantastic, life battery also is great if you really need mobility, but out of power source it start to get very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago Moura

product_meta.title: Apple MacBook Pro MD213LL/A 13.3-Inch Laptop with Retina Display (OLD VERSION)
feature_bullets: 2.5 GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 processor (Turbo Boost up to 3.1GHz) with 3MB shared L3 cache
13.3 inch LED-backlit Retina display, 2560-by-1600 native resolution, Intel HD Graphics 4000
Mac OS X Mountain Lion, 7 Hour Battery Life
